column5: Now that the Smerch is back from Quinte, we had to get together and chase smallies again. Nice weather and 3' vis on the water. Lots of minnows dancing around being chased. We hit a few spots on the system and consistently caught fish.      Of course, I kept finding the WGSF.  Gonna have to pour some more tube jigs soon. The 12 and L Gibson have been given many a sacrificial offering this summer.
great pics....  looks you two were having fun
Nice job, I would kill for some bass fishing right now!  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
